name: Heroes Race
description:
Heroes, Assemble! Show your superpowers and change heroes to fit the track and win the race!

Make the right choices and use their powerful skills at full potential to reach the finish line before your opponent!


If you want to run like a REAL hero, always choose the right one! It makes you faster, stronger, and more badass!

Features:
- Easy to play: Tap on the screen to choose the appropriate power
- Cool graphics
- Be a Superhero!
- Cool powers
- 100% Free

- Challenge other players
